bibl.title: Dreams and Divination in Magical Ritual.
Magika Hiera. Ancient Greek Magic and Religion

bibl.note: English translation by Dirk OBBINK of two chapters from an unpublished monograph (Magie und Mantik der Griechen und Römer), with a preface by Fritz GRAF. - See pp. 179-182: Dream transmission and the papyri.
EITREM Samson †, Dreams and Divination in Magical Ritual.
Magika Hiera. Ancient Greek Magic and Religion (Oxford, 1990) pp. 175-187.
